name: Gravity Battles
description:
Space themed, turn based artillery strategy game where you control space stations in a battle of skill and tactics against the laws of physics and gravity. Up to 12 players can play in multiplayer battles, or you can fight against deadly computer AI. Aim your shots by changing the angle and power sliders to account for the gravity of local planets and stars. Click end-turn when you are ready, watch the chaos unfold. Click hyperspace to relocate the station instead of shooting. Was previously known as "Death Star Battles" and is based on the Amiga/PC classic game "Gravity Wars".

Check our website for progress on the sequal "Mammoth Gravity Battles" - which is a fully 3D version with mutliple weapons, destructable planets, four player battles and a massive single layer campaign mode:

http://www.mammothgravitybattles.com
